title: [K-12] AI-Driven Self-Regulated Learning Programming Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental programming concepts and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning facilitated by an AI mentoring platform in a digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners improve problem-solving efficiency by over 30% by receiving real-time feedback via an AI mentoring system during programming tasks
Learners complete one individual project within four weeks by utilizing self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, progress monitoring, performance evaluation)
Learners apply metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-reflection) at over 80% proficiency while analyzing complex algorithm problems in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
